question: Given a large dataset of audio recordings, describe at least three feature-extraction techniques (e.g., Mel-spectrogram, log-Mel, MFCC) and discuss the pros and cons of each for a SER task.
transcript: I am Haneen Ahmad and I have worked in the Graduation project with this feature extraction techniques like my respect to Graham, Locust Spectrum and Malul frequency, common substrad. There are common feature extraction techniques. They are used for extracting features and map the sound waves into features that can be understandable by the computer. scores.name: Clarity
